name: Single-Leg Isometric Calf Raise (Support)
setup: Stand near wall or stable object for fingertip balance
Shift weight onto working foot, opposite knee flexed slightly
Ball of foot centered, heel just off floor
steps: Rise onto ball of foot to strong but comfortable height
Lower slowly after hold, rest briefly, repeat other side as needed
Add light load in free hand only after stable bodyweight mastery
safety: Discontinue if sharp Achilles or plantar fascia pain; use bilateral version if unstable.

prescriptionHints.notes: Gradually extend hold duration before adding load.

joints.notes: Maintain controlled midfoot pressure; stop if tendon pain persists.
